parameterDecorators.name: access
parameterDecorators.description: TRUE if the Watcher was given permissions, FALSE if permissions were removed.

functionDecorators.name: _acceptAdmin
functionDecorators.description: Accepts transfer of admin rights. msg.sender must be pendingAdmin. Admin function for pending admin to accept role and update admin.

functionDecorators.name: _setPendingAdmin
functionDecorators.description: Begins transfer of admin rights. The newPendingAdmin must call `_acceptAdmin` to finalize the transfer. Admin function to begin change of admin. The newPendingAdmin must call `_acceptAdmin` to finalize the transfer.

parameterDecorators.name: newPendingAdmin
parameterDecorators.description: New pending admin.

functionDecorators.name: claimErc20Token
functionDecorators.description: Destination account claim the amount from the escorw.

parameterDecorators.name: senderId
parameterDecorators.description: The sender unique ID generated by EPN.

parameterDecorators.name: destinationId
parameterDecorators.description: The destination unique ID generated by EPN.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: The ERC20 token address.

functionDecorators.name: claimEthAmount
functionDecorators.description: Destination account claim the amount from the escorw.

parameterDecorators.name: senderId
parameterDecorators.description: The sender unique ID generated by EPN.

parameterDecorators.name: destinationId
parameterDecorators.description: The destination unique ID generated by EPN.

functionDecorators.name: refundErc20Token
functionDecorators.description: Sender account claim the amount from the escorw when the payment expires.

parameterDecorators.name: senderId
parameterDecorators.description: The sender unique ID generated by EPN.

parameterDecorators.name: destinationId
parameterDecorators.description: The destination unique ID generated by EPN.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: The ERC20 token address.

functionDecorators.name: refundEthAmount
functionDecorators.description: Sender account claim the amount from the escorw when the payment expires.

parameterDecorators.name: senderId
parameterDecorators.description: The sender unique ID generated by EPN.

parameterDecorators.name: destinationId
parameterDecorators.description: The destination unique ID generated by EPN.

functionDecorators.name: sendErc20Token
functionDecorators.description: Send ERC20 token from sender account to destination account if destination account has registered EPN, otherwise added it escorw.

parameterDecorators.name: senderId
parameterDecorators.description: The sender unique ID generated by EPN.

parameterDecorators.name: destinationId
parameterDecorators.description: The destination unique ID generated by EPN.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: The ERC20 token address.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: The token value to be sent from the sender account.

functionDecorators.name: sendErc20TokenToWallet
functionDecorators.description: Send ERc20 token from sender account to destination account.

parameterDecorators.name: senderId
parameterDecorators.description: The sender unique ID generated by EPN.

parameterDecorators.name: destinationAddress
parameterDecorators.description: The destination account.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: The ERC20 token address.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: The token value to be sent from the sender account.

functionDecorators.name: sendEthAmount
functionDecorators.description: Send ether from sender account to destination account if destination account has registered EPN, otherwise added it escorw.

parameterDecorators.name: senderId
parameterDecorators.description: The sender unique ID generated by EPN.

parameterDecorators.name: destinationId
parameterDecorators.description: The destination unique ID generated by EPN.

functionDecorators.name: sendEthAmountToWallet
functionDecorators.description: Send ether from sender account to destination account.

parameterDecorators.name: senderId
parameterDecorators.description: The sender unique ID generated by EPN.

parameterDecorators.name: destinationAddress
parameterDecorators.description: The destination account.

functionDecorators.name: setPaymentExpiryPeriod
functionDecorators.description: Sets new payment expiry period in days.

parameterDecorators.name: paymentExpiryPeriod
parameterDecorators.description: The expiry period in days.
